mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_applylist (atext, astate, adeleted, amoddate, aregdate, member_mno, board_bno) VALUES (#{atext}, #{astate}, #{adeleted}, now(), now(), #{member_mno}, #{board_bno})
mapper.select: SELECT ano, atext, astate, adeleted, amoddate, bno, bstate, btitle, bcontent, bprice, bdeleted, bmoddate FROM tbl_applylist a LEFT JOIN tbl_board b ON a.board_bno = b.bno WHERE a.member_mno = #{mno} AND adeleted != 1 AND a.member_mno > 0 GROUP BY bno ORDER BY ano DESC
